text.section:
Definitions in other articles applying to this article and the sections in which they appear are:
"Contract for sale," KRS 355.2-106;
"Lessee in ordinary course," KRS 355.2A-103; and
"â€˜Receiptâ€™ of goods," KRS 355.2-103.
In addition, Article 1 of KRS Chapter 355 contains general definitions and principles of construction and interpretation applicable throughout this article.

law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 7-102, effective July 1, 1960.
